{2}, Discard Worldsoul Ambassador: Pursue Wonder. [i](Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from your sanctum and put it into your hand.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]It alone keeps a story it can never tell.[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i][i]Augmented[/i] – [/i]Exile Sailing the Starsea: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may instead copy target spell you control twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
When Starsea Leviathan enters, you may pursue Wonder. If you don't, draw a card. [i](To pursue Wonder, reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from your sancum and put it into your hand.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I am of the first world visited by the Wonderlands, centuries ago. It has confided in me.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Each player can't draw more than one card each turn.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“It's subtle, but the plane is guiding its visitors to fixate on their own desires, rather than itself.”
—Eteres, planar analyst[/i]

cards.rules_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. This mana can't be spent to cast a spell with mana value 4 or less.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The beings of this plane shine with light and mana, brilliant and tempting. I can't help but be reminded of an anglerfish's lure.”
—Fieldbook of Manuela Martinez[/i]
